articles.author: Brooke Masters, Antoine Gara
articles.title: How Adebayo Ogunlesi's contrarian bet led to $12.5bn BlackRock tie-up - Financial Times
articles.description: Global Infrastructure Partners co-founder steps into the limelight with ‘transformational’ deal
articles.content: Adebayo Ogunlesi, co-founder of Global Infrastructure Partners, credits his wife Amelia for a career switch that led on Friday to a $12.5bn deal and a leadership position at BlackRock, the worlds lar… [+7989 chars]
